You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesD D] > &dot;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Dot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a8/index.htm U+000A8].
  * `&dot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/02d9/index.htm U+002D9].
